message.content:
{"id": "5473", "title": "Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces", "description": "Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces in Build 200110251.", "OB": "When intermixing tabs and spaces in a default text editor, typing <space><tab>some text<tab>some text2.", "EB": "After highlighting the two lines above and executing the ShiftLeft action, the selected lines do not move or shift as expected.", "SR": "To reproduce:
1. Open a default text editor.
2. Type <space><tab>some text<tab>some text2.
3. Highlight the two lines above.
4. Execute the ShiftLeft action.

Expected result: The selected lines should be indented or shifted to the left.

Actual result: The selected lines do not move."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
